title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 2600-2.4 - Certification of continuing professional education courses, software, and providers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 2600-2.4 - Certification of continuing professional education courses, software, and providers

State Regulations

The department shall identify accredited CPE courses, providers, and/or software or other media acceptable for use in satisfying the
CPE requirements for registered tax return preparers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
2600-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
